periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: Sleet and a slight chance of freezing rain. Cloudy, with a low around 29. East northeast wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Sleet and a slight chance of snow and a slight chance of freezing rain before 8am, then sleet and freezing rain and a slight chance of snow between 8am and 11am, then freezing rain and a slight chance of sleet between 11am and 3pm, then freezing rain and a slight chance of sleet and a slight chance of thunderstorms between 3pm and 4pm, then freezing rain and showers and thunderstorms between 4pm and 5pm, then freezing rain likely and a slight chance of sleet and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a high near 32. East northeast wind 12 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Freezing rain likely and a slight chance of thunderstorms before 11pm, then snow and freezing rain. Cloudy. Low around 22, with temperatures rising to around 24 overnight. North northeast wind 12 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 9am. Cloudy, with a high near 26. North northwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 12. Northwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 25. Northwest wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 5. Northwest wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 21. Northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 5. West wind around 2 mph.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 29. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 17. South wind around 3 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 30. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Snow Showers then Mostly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 17. West northwest wind around 3 mph.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 30. West wind 3 to 7 mph.
